statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{12 \, x^{3} - 14 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 6 , 20 \, x^{3} - 12 \, x^{2} - 8 \, x + 12 , -5 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 3 , -8 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 6 , 3 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
